[![@wq/pandas][logo]][docs]

**@wq/pandas** is a simple JavaScript utility to load and parse CSV files generated by [Django REST Pandas] from multi-indexed DataFrames.

### [Documentation][docs]

[**Installation**][installation]
&bull;
[**API**][api]
